content: I'm not sure why but for some reason the 1.3.0 ungrammar release doesn't contain the new ungrammar https://docs.rs/crate/ungrammar/1.3.0/source/rust.ungram
The macro 2.0 stuff landed in it, but the lifetime changes are missing
Jonas Schievink published 1.3.0 10 minutes before i merged this that explains it :big_smile:
So you need another PR with version bump?

Yep would need another, though maybe its better to wait for the macro 2.0 PR to get done first since I probably need to rebase my stuff on it then anyways, since that will most likely have a few required changes to compile as well?
@Jonas Schievink you are now officially in charge of merging lifetimes node-ification work :D
Rebased my PR on yours with ungrammar set to 1.4 and codegen regenerated :thumbs_up:
